Package interfaceUtilisateur

Class Window

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
interfaceUtilisateur.Window
public class Window extends javafx.application.Application
The Window class represents the main application window. It extends the JavaFX Application class and provides methods for initializing and setting up the user interface components.

    • showAlert

      public static void showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, String title, String content, boolean wait, Console console)
      Shows an alert dialog on the application window.
      Parameters:
      alertType - The type of alert dialog (e.g., ERROR, INFORMATION).
      title - The title of the alert dialog.
      content - The content text of the alert dialog.
      wait - Indicates whether to wait for user interaction (true) or not (false).
      console - The Console object for displaying messages.
